HEADER.MARQUEE-ELEMENT-3: Works for Red Dot Design Award

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Who I Am
ABOUT.TEXT-1: Hi, I'm Louisa, a creative and tech-savvy individual with a solid foundation in graphic and object design, as well as experience as a media manager in digital and print. After an intense immersion into the world of computer visualisation and design, and four successful years as a digital business manager, I am currently in the midst of an exciting training course to become a full-stack developer at the Developer Academy. These steps reflect my deep affinity for innovation, design, technology and art.
ABOUT.TEXT-2: My career has been characterised by a constant search for new challenges and a passion for combining technological solutions with creative design. As someone who is at home at the intersection of computer science and creative design, I strive to create projects that are not only technically sophisticated, but also aesthetically pleasing. Immerse yourself in my projects and discover how I turn my visions into reality. Thank you for visiting!

JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This app is a Slack clone, simplifying team communication with real-time messaging and organized channels.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.SUBTITLE: Technologies
SKILLS.TEXT: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.SUBTITLE-2-TEXT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.SPEECH-BUBBLE: I have a special interest in learning Python, ML and ANN.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's work together
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.TEXT: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
